ValidationRule.description: Height must be less than or equal to zero when Crate Type is No Crate . Supports Only For Hong Kong
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF ( AND ( RecordType.Name = 'Hong Kong',ISPICKVAL(Crate_Type__c , "No Crate. Supports Only" ) , Height_in__c > 0 ) , TRUE, FALSE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Height must be less than or equal to zero when Crate Type is No Crate . Supports Only
